# ENTITY::DELETE_ENTITY

## Summary
Deletes an entity instantly from the world

## Parameters
* **ENTITY_INDEX\*** entity

## Notes
<!-- AUTOGENERATED: Remove this line before editing -->
Deletes the specified entity, then sets the handle pointed to by the pointer to NULL.
